name: Aria at the Funeraria
description:
Submission to Otome Jam 2021

SYNOPSIS:

Sari’s routine in the funeral home run by her father is nothing special. She attends classes at the local college, then comes home to do the makeup of the corpses. One evening, she wakes from a nap to the sound of mysterious music. After that, nothing is the same. Entities she’s never seen before are running rampant in her home.

CONTENT WARNING!!! Textual depictions of violence and bodily injuries.

FEATURES:

  • 3 routes (2 romantic, 1 platonic)
  • 12 endings (4 per route)
  • 23,800+ words

CHARACTERS:

ROSARIO ROXAS

Sari is a college sophomore enrolled in the mortuary studies program.

Likes:
Desairology, or caring for the hair, skin, and nails of cadavers.

ROGELIO ROXAS

Single father and owner of Roxas & Roxas Funeraria. He suffers from migraines when he hears music.

Likes:
Teaching his daughter the tricks of the trade.

YAEL

A music student and part-time mortician’s assistant. Sari’s long-time friend is a bit of a scaredy-cat.

Likes:
Playing his guitar.

GHOST

Sari has always wanted a third eye. Is this ghost a wish come true, or something sinister?

Likes:
???

CORPSE BRIDE

Mr. Roxas definitely embalmed her this afternoon. So why’s this girl still wandering around?

Likes:
???

CREDITS:

  • Writing: ilyilaice
  • Coding & Programming: Marionette
  • Sprites & CGs: what_an_animal
  • BGs: makigirl
  • Music: Beans
  • GUI: Gido

QUESTIONS:

  1. Who is your favorite character?
  2. What is your favorite ending?
  3. Any thoughts or questions?

Thank you so much for playing!

See the Lemma Soft forum thread here.
